results.title: Trespass on Summerland
results.creator_credit: Brighton Grammar School (Vic.). Film Makers Club
results.brief_description: A few boys enjoying a camping holiday are evicted from their camp by an irate farmer. They later save his son trapped on a precipitous cliff face. (Awards: 2nd prize at the International Contest for Young Film Makers, Milan, Italy)
results.description: A few boys enjoying a camping holiday are evicted from their camp by an irate farmer. They later save his son trapped on a precipitous cliff face. (Awards: 2nd prize at the International Contest for Young Film Makers, Milan, Italy)

results.title: Toronto jazz
results.creator_credit: Don Owen, Roman Kroitor and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: Toronto is regarded as the third largest jazz centre in North America. This film features a cross-section of jazz bands of that city: the Lenny Breau Trio, the Don Thompson Quintet and the Alf Jones Quartet. Their styles show creative self-expression, hard work, and improvisation.

results.title: Stamina
results.brief_description: A film illustrating the manufacture of Stamina trousers and showing the care exercised in all stages. The various processes are shown together with a brief history of men’s dress and the sewing machine.

results.title: Spread your wings: making it with TAFE
results.creator_credit: John O'Shea, Chris Stewart, Technical and Further Education and Documentary Films
results.brief_description: An impressionistic film which is intended to provide information about the opportunities offered by Technical and Further Education in vocational training, and in recreational courses to meet community requirements. It is not intended to give detailed information on the breadth of courses and curricula but is rather a stimulus film aimed at encouraging enrolment.

results.title: Evaluation
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Changes…From the Inside”.
Depicts a school that takes its evaluation seriously. Keeping in touch with its community has required constant monitoring and some innovative adjustments. Staff, curriculum, in service and Supplementary Grants meetings are now one and the same and are occasions where parents and teachers learn together.

results.title: Passing Era of the Steam Horse
results.brief_description: Steam locomotives have been replaced by diesels on the Victorian Railways. Their history in the system is briefly covered, and various types are shown in operation, concluding with the narrow gauge service from Ferntree Gully to Gembrook being restored as a tourist feature.
results.description: Steam locomotives have been replaced by diesels on the Victorian Railways. Their history in the system is briefly covered, and various types are shown in operation, concluding with the narrow gauge service from Ferntree Gully to Gembrook being restored as a tourist feature.

results.title: Our friends, why?
results.creator_credit: R. Dudfield, J. Biss and Brighton Grammar School (Vic.). Film Makers Club
results.brief_description: The story revolves around two brothers, their friends and a broken kite. When the friends find out they have been hoaxed by the brothers, there is a rumpus, but finally all shake hands and are friends again. (Award: Best film of all categories at the 1963 Milan International Festival for Young Film Makers)

results.title: Listen to a city
results.creator_credit: Eric Fullilove, Andrew J. Helgeson and Cinesound
results.brief_description: A sophisticated view of Melbourne taking in its gardens, shops, theatres, restaurants, nightclubs and discotheques. Sporting activities include a race meeting, a football match, and water sports. Highlights Melbourne’s annual Moombe Festival and includes scenes at Montsalvat.

results.title: [Lasker and Lasker Surf Outfitters: bathing suits and caps: advertisement]
results.brief_description: Promotes Lasker and Lasker Surf Outfitters of 402 and 404 George St, Sydney, N.S.W. Women and men model bathing suits and caps on a beach. Shots include the models standing next to a surf boat, models with parasols, and a model putting on a beach coat. (Cinema advertisement, includes intertitles).
